about_the_game:
The Bit Shifter Original Soundtrack by the amazing composer, Aldo "Trnzaddict" Ferrante. Get your groove on with these amazing trance tracks! Stay tuned as more songs are composed they will be added at no extra cost.

Bit Shifter OST
Shift into CyberSpace
Track List

1 - Bit World
2 - Artificial Embers
3 - Briefing
4 - Biogenetica
5 - Bit City
6 - Spherical
7 - Shifting Bits
8 - Utopia
9 - Power Up
10 - Malicious Code
